name: Beat animals
description:
Avoid the herd!

It is a very interesting dodge+shooting game. In this game, you can experience a very awesome shooting effect, and it can also bring you a very interesting fighting experience. Every shot in the game is a test of your technology. Let's fight together!

Game highlights

1. This game has a very good classic fighting mode, and the entire operating feel is also very good!

2. Endless mode, there will always be enemies until you die!

3. This is a casual game that can help you spend the boring time. You need to manipulate your characters and shoot bullets to kill the animals!

Game features:

1. Abundant and diverse herds;

2. Compact and exciting game rhythm;

3. Simple and clear control experience;

4. Unique pattern design.
